name: Rainy Mood
description:
Water is in danger. What gave birth to every form of life is now tainted by human activities.

Calm down and listen. Enjoy the simple noise of the rain. Remember that it is at the origin of everything you know.

Submission for the Weekly Hour Game Jam W5 2017.
